title: Free RP?
body: I got $50 rp from riot games and idk why. pls somebody explain. On the gifting history it says from __unknown__

replies.body:
Assuming you haven't entered any recent tourneys/competitions or anything of the sort, your best bet is going to be to submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They ought to be able to tell you where it came from and probably why (or at least how) you received it.
